mapper.insert: insert into basket_t (b_num, g_id, m_num, b_option, b_count, b_price, b_temp) values(basket_t_seq.nextval, #{g_id}, #{m_num}, #{b_option}, #{b_count}, #{b_price}, #{b_temp})
mapper.select: select b.b_num, b.b_option, b.b_count, b.b_price, b.b_temp, g.g_id, g.g_sale, g.g_name, f.f_svname from basket_t b, goods_t g, (select * from file_t where f_jtname='G' and f_main_yn='Y') f where b_temp ='Y' and b.g_id = g.g_id and f.f_jtkey(+)=g.g_id and m_num = #{m_num} order by b_num desc

select f.f_num, g.g_name, g.g_price, b.b_count, b.b_option, g.g_price * b.b_count as totalPrice, g.g_id, b.b_num from (select * from file_t where f_jtname='G' and f_main_yn='Y') f right outer join goods_t g on f.f_jtkey = g.g_id inner join basket_t b on b.g_id = g.g_id and and b_temp ='N' and b.m_num = #{m_num}
select * from basket_t where m_num = #{m_num} and g_id = #{g_id}
